properties.name: management.cloudfoundry.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable extended Cloud Foundry actuator endpoints.

properties.name: management.cloudfoundry.skip-ssl-validation
properties.description: Whether to skip SSL verification for Cloud Foundry actuator endpoint security calls.

properties.name: management.endpoint.health.probes.add-additional-paths
properties.description: Whether to make the liveness and readiness health groups available on the main server port.

properties.name: management.endpoint.health.probes.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable liveness and readiness probes.

properties.name: management.endpoint.health.validate-group-membership
properties.description: Whether to validate health group membership on startup. Validation fails if a group includes or excludes a health contributor that does not exist.

properties.name: management.endpoints.access.default
properties.description: Default access level for all endpoints.

properties.name: management.endpoints.access.max-permitted
properties.description: Maximum level of endpoint access that is permitted. Caps an endpoint's individual access level (management.endpoint.<id>.access) and the default access (management.endpoints.access.default).'

properties.name: management.endpoints.enabled-by-default
properties.description: Whether to enable or disable all endpoints by default.
